quick_replies.description: Learn about prices and cost factors

responses.greeting: Hello! I'm the AI assistant of FiscalePro. I'll help answer questions about our services and artificial intelligence solutions. How can I help you?
responses.pricing: AI project cost depends on many factors: task type, complexity, timeline, and integrations. Base cost starts from $50,000 for 3 months of development. Use our calculator above for precise calculation or contact us for personal consultation.

Exact timelines depend on your requirements and data readiness.
